程序包 GameConsole.Core

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Driver
    The main entrance of the application
    GameLoader
    This class is used to load the game session the user saved
    GameSaver
    This class is used to save the game if user wants to save the current session
    GameState
    Set up basic states of the game Current phase, current player
    MapLoader
    The class is to load a map to the game
    SingleGameMode
    This class is for single game mode
    TournamentStimulater
    This class is for tournament game mode
    WindowMain
    This class is to display the interface of the game where the player can visually perform game operations.
    World
    This class handles with world the player are in and mange the corresponding behaviors
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    MapLoader.ScrollOptions
